name: Blue Stroke Labs Pvt Ltd
overview:
Bluestroke Labs is a Professional software company based in India. Our key focus is to deliver state - of - the - art web programming services much to the customer satisfaction. Keeping in mind of the requirements of the clients and recent market trends, we provide quality dynamic web programming services. We have exploited the power of latest technology by infusing it with our work culture for bettering the quality of our web development services.

Our aim is to constantly deliver best performance by using leading-edge technology, high-quality research, and world class quality processes. Our marketing department is experts in the field of accelerations. They adopt a get the order that are highly necessary to each company’s needs and adopt a systematic approach, along with adaptable processes, that creates sustainable value to survive.

We have a team of well-qualified professionals with proven track record who strive to innovate for leading you above and beyond your stated goals. We have skilled resources to take care of your requirements in PHP and MYSQL.

High Quality Solutions at an affordable Price:

Bluestroke Labs is a company specialized in custom software development, portal development web design, Internet /Intranet applications and consulting services. The company has potential and experience in development of complex solutions for its customers - implementation of concepts for data security, corporate and virtual private networks, databases and software development.

We create modern software products for business management, based on Client/Server and Internet/Intranet technology decisions in accordance with the leading world standards in the field of IT. We create Internet sites led by the demands of our clients - with advertisement exposure, aimed at marketing or containing database. We provide planning, professional development and management of web sites plus hosting, search engine marketing, updating and support.

The Business:

Bluestroke Labs is in the business of solving problems for small to midsize companies while helping them extend their reach globally.

The Scope:

Bluestroke Labs specialize in delivering value-proposition solutions, which currently serve the following areas of interest:

* Web development
* Internet Marketing
* Graphic Design / Web design
* Software Development
* BlackBerry Development

Core Mission Statement:

Our core ideology is to find a way to offer high quality and high value with our solutions. Not one or the other. Although this goes against many management and operational theories, we can and will, under most situations, deliver premier solutions at an affordable price. If, through our discovery session, we can?t deliver high quality at high value, then we will not take on a project. We are adamant about not taking on a project unless we can cross the chasm between quality and price.

offices.address1: No:497, Near Indian Oil Petrol Pump

milestones.description: company incorporated. Bluestroke Labs is now Blue Stroke Labs PVt Ltd.
